shed_market_molting_gate.title: Molting Gate
shed_market_molting_gate.text: Molted banners rustle above a gate where sentinels wear their past faces on sashes, weighing each visitor's willingness to trade what was.

choices.text: Present your guest-law braid for entry.
(Trickster) Swap masks with a mouser of borrowed selves and slip inside laughing.
(Emissary) Pledge cross-hub courtesy to the sentinel and secure a guest mark.
Return to the Startways Nexus.

shed_market_shed_bazaar.title: Bazaar of Shed Skins
shed_market_shed_bazaar.text: Stalls shimmer with hanging husks, vendors swapping stories of the selves they've molted while charters of consent hum above the crowd.

choices.text: Browse rows of shed selves cataloged for barter.
Inspect the metamorph stalls where husks are weighed.
Follow chrysalis steam toward the cocoons' hostel alcove.
(Arbiter) Adjudicate a dispute over a shared adolescence.
(Sneaky+Resonant) Blend into the hush chorus echoing beneath the stalls.
(Trickster+Lumenar) Cast mirage-lanterns to access the mask gallery.
(Dreamwalker+Healer) Tend the cocoon chorus and follow the shared dreamway.
Trail the lantern stream toward the name archives.
Hang your last borrowed mask and assume the rotation desk for good.
Leave the market and return to the main transit hub.

shed_market_metamorph_stalls.title: Metamorph Stalls
shed_market_metamorph_stalls.text: Glass-backed counters display husks cooling on hooks while ethicists tally consent slips and metamorphs trade tips on easing into new selves.

choices.text: Help the appraisers sort claim slips into proper ledgers.
(Trickster) Stage a persona-swap demonstration to ease the nervous queue.
(Emissary) Convene the stallholders about a shared amnesty pledge.
Trace the refraction spines toward the ledger's witnessing window.

shed_market_molting_appraisers.title: Molting Appraisers
shed_market_molting_appraisers.text: Ledger keepers rotate molted skins beneath glowstones, matching each to its consent braid before filing tonight's exchanges.

choices.text: Sort the claim slips into ledger order, calming the backlog.
Pocket an unclaimed slip as payment for the meticulous work.
(Arbiter) Compare conflicting ledgers until every entry aligns.
Borrow splicer tools to salvage a damaged husk.

shed_market_skin_splicer_lab.title: Skin Splicer Lab
shed_market_skin_splicer_lab.text: Steam curls above tables where technicians stitch consent sigils into reclaimed skins, double-checking that each splice honors its origin.

choices.text: Stitch consent sigils so each reclaimed skin keeps its story intact.
(Lumenar) Maintain the vats' glow so new selves don't smear.
Carry the splicers' notes to the ledger window for safekeeping.
Return the borrowed tools before anyone panics.

shed_market_identity_vault.title: Identity Vault
shed_market_identity_vault.text: Shelves of sealed husks line a cooled vault, each tagged with testimony ribbons awaiting the amnesty filing.

choices.text: Restore archived names to the crates they nearly lost.
(Lumenar) Paint the shelves with gentle truthlight glyphs.
Deliver the claim slip toward the proof counter queue.
Slip back to the appraisers' tables.

shed_market_identity_proof_counter.title: Identity Proof Counter
shed_market_identity_proof_counter.text: Clerks flick between mirrored panes, confirming that each visitor's current face aligns with their consent braids before issuing passage tokens.

choices.text: Submit the molting claim slip you secured from the vault.
(Arbiter) Cite market precedent guaranteeing provisional identity.
(Lumenar) Cast a truthlight halo so the queue sees you clearly.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Reference your ledger credit to vouch for the claim.
Step away from the counter before deciding.

shed_market_trickster_swapmeet.title: Trickster Swapmeet
shed_market_trickster_swapmeet.text: Performers juggle voice boxes and masks, demonstrating how to trade selves without breaking consent ledgers.

choices.text: Juggle borrowed personas to relax the anxious queue.
(Trickster) Orchestrate a daring multi-mask trade for the waiting patrons.
Palm an unclaimed slip while everyone watches the routine.
Guide a jittery metamorph toward the Dreamwalker's seam.

shed_market_emissary_forum.title: Emissary Forum
shed_market_emissary_forum.text: Stallholders cluster beneath rotating husks, debating how the amnesty charter should protect visitors wearing borrowed faces tonight.

choices.text: Draft a shared amnesty statement for the ledger clerks to review.
(Emissary) Call in cross-hub observers to witness the pledges.
Ask the pledgers to rehearse within the pledge chorus alcove.
Return to the metamorph stalls.

shed_market_arbiter_lattice.title: Arbiter Lattice
shed_market_arbiter_lattice.text: Threads of annotated precedent hang like a loom, each knot linking a past dispute about temporary selves to the current amnesty push.

choices.text: Review testimonies until contradictions unravel into clarity.
(Arbiter) Issue a binding lattice affirming portable identities for the night.
Forward the reconciled cases to the charter antechamber clerks.
Return to the appraisers' worktables.

shed_market_lumenar_refraction.title: Refraction Spines
shed_market_lumenar_refraction.text: Lumenar rods bloom over the stalls, bending light so every shifting face holds steady edges for the clerks watching from above.

choices.text: Hang glow-sashed lanterns to make each metamorph legible.
(Lumenar) Weave a recognition halo that follows every borrowed face.
Channel the steady lights toward the Dreamwalker seam.
Return to the metamorph stalls below.

shed_market_quiet_ledger_window.title: Quiet Ledger Window
shed_market_quiet_ledger_window.text: Clerks observe from a high window, annotating who has proof enough to carry a borrowed self beyond the market.

choices.text: Submit reorganized testimonies for docketing.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Request an expedited amnesty docket for the night.
Relay the pledgers toward the chorus alcove.
Return to the identity vault for more records.

shed_market_pledge_chorus.title: Pledge Chorus
shed_market_pledge_chorus.text: An amphitheater of layered husks resounds with rehearsed introductions, each metamorph practicing their chosen name for the clerks.

choices.text: Rehearse the pledge until every voice steadies on its new name.
(Trickster) Break the tension with quick improv masks.
Lead the chorus toward the charter antechamber.
Disperse back through the bazaar to recruit more voices.

shed_market_charter_antechamber.title: Charter Antechamber
shed_market_charter_antechamber.text: Clerks spread the night's petitions across a long table, waiting for proof bundles before forwarding them to the charter workshop.

choices.text: File the reconciled docket with the charter clerks.
Seat the pledge chorus beneath luminous witness marks.
Sign the amnesty register alongside the pledge chorus.
Loop back through the pledge chorus to gather more support.

shed_market_identity_broker.title: Identity Broker's Pavilion
shed_market_identity_broker.text: Ledger-slates glow with columns of retired names while a broker smiles through three alternating faces, offering contracts for who you might become tonight.

choices.text: Evaluate the ledger of molted names awaiting guardianship.
(Lumenar) Ignite a truthlight to expose fraudulent moltings.
Accept a borrowed persona for the evening crowd.
Return to the bazaar thoroughfare.

shed_market_echo_arcade.title: Echo Arcade
shed_market_echo_arcade.text: Curtained stalls pulse with murmured identities, resonance threads guiding whispers through hidden deal-mirrors.

choices.text: Tune the hush chorus toward the ledger court to expose fraud.
Redirect the chorus toward Freehands caretakers awaiting relief.
Slip back into the bazaar flow before the echoes shift.

shed_market_mask_gallery.title: Mask Gallery
shed_market_mask_gallery.text: A gallery of borrowed visages glitters under lantern prisms, each mask whispering the memories it once carried.

choices.text: Catalogue the masks for ledger archivists awaiting new exhibits.
Stage an impromptu lantern show to fund the mutual aid stall.
Return the masks to their hooks and rejoin the bazaar.
Bind the gallery's borrowed faces into a calm rotation you oversee.

shed_market_dreamway_coop.title: Dreamway Mutual Aid Coop
shed_market_dreamway_coop.text: Cocoons line a quiet alcove where healers and dreamwalkers weave shared rest for travelers molting new selves.

choices.text: Coordinate shared dreams that guide aid to the overworked caretakers.
Record the restful patterns for Quiet Ledger stewards.
Wake gently and drift back to the bazaar.
Head toward the market district exit.

shed_market_shadow_exchange.title: Shadow Exchange
shed_market_shadow_exchange.text: Braided shade cords anchor contracts for shared silhouettes, clerks ensuring every traded shadow can still find its owner at dawn.

choices.text: Study the contracts stitched from shade thread.
(Emissary) Broker mutual custody of a shared silhouette between travelers.
Trade your shadow IOU for a market berth.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Audit the shadow contracts to redirect patron funding.
(Freehands 1+) Build a mutual aid loop for molt refugees waiting nearby.
Slip away toward the mirage canal.

shed_market_quiet_ledger_fund.title: Quiet Ledger Patron Hall
shed_market_quiet_ledger_fund.text: Ledger patrons weigh amber donations beside contracts, debating how to stabilize the bazaar's shifting identities.

choices.text: Earmark funding for the charter workshop's legal support.
Divert a stipend toward the Freehands dreamway coop.
Conclude the audit and return to the shadow exchange.
Head toward the market district exit.

shed_market_freehands_network.title: Freehands Molt Network
shed_market_freehands_network.text: Volunteers distribute shared skins, meal chits, and rest schedules to travelers awaiting their next self.

choices.text: Coordinate aid packages with the dreamway coop.
Report usage totals back to the Quiet Ledger patrons.
Return to the bazaar with renewed purpose.
Leave the network offices and return to the main market.
Head toward the market district exit.

shed_market_name_lanterns.title: Name Lantern Stream
shed_market_name_lanterns.text: Lanterns bob along a suspended canal, each etched with names gently retired, waiting for caretakers to walk beside them.

choices.text: Trace the lanterns cataloging castoff monikers.
(Lumenar) Reignite a dim lantern so its bearer feels seen.
(Trickster) Rearrange lantern order to spark conversations between strangers.
Return to the bazaar.

shed_market_ledger_court.title: Ledger Court
shed_market_ledger_court.text: A circle of clerks and keepers review petitions for identity amnesty, quills scratching beside jars of shed voices.

choices.text: Listen to the arbitrators weigh petitions.
(Arbiter) Cite guest-law precedent for shared custody of a name.
(Emissary) Invite Aeol witnesses to endorse the ruling for other hubs.
Depart toward the shadow exchange.

shed_market_lumen_stage.title: Lumen Stage
shed_market_lumen_stage.text: Performers shed light like cloaks, projecting constellations of the names they've retired while the crowd hums the chorus of who they became.

choices.text: Watch luminaries shed borrowed glows across the crowd.
(Lumenar) Project your radiance to reveal hidden names ready for amnesty.
(Trickster) Sync a playful echo that loosens tensions among traders.
Return to the bazaar.

shed_market_cocoon_hostel.title: Cocoon Hostel
shed_market_cocoon_hostel.text: Suspended cocoons sway gently, each cradle hosting travelers between selves while caretakers brew teas that steady shifting identities.

choices.text: Rest among the cocoons and listen to whispered rebirths.
(Emissary) Pair travelers with guides who knew their former selves.
(Lumenar) Bathe the cocoons in steady glow so sleepers wake gently.
Seek the Dreamwalker tending the deepest cocoons.
Stay to run the cocoon rota and keep the teas brewing warm.

shed_market_wandering_archive.title: Wandering Archive
shed_market_wandering_archive.text: Archivists carry shelves on their backs, cataloging every traded name with footnotes on consent, continuity, and future claims.

choices.text: Catalog the traded identities you recognized from other hubs.
(Arbiter) Flag contradictory contracts for renewed consent.
(Emissary) Add guest-law footnotes from other hubs to the archive.
Slip through the shelves toward the mirage canal.

shed_market_mirage_canal.title: Mirage Canal
shed_market_mirage_canal.text: Water mirrors ripple with glimpses of who you might be tomorrow, ferriers steering gondolas shaped like shed skins.

choices.text: Follow the mirrored water toward the rally of new names.
(Trickster) Send ripples carrying secret jokes about past selves.
(Emissary) Lead visiting dignitaries safely along the reflections.
Return to the shadow exchange.

shed_market_molt_rally.title: Molt Rally
shed_market_molt_rally.text: Crowds celebrate as travelers trade sashes of past achievements, drafting accords to carry multiple selves respectfully.

choices.text: Join the crowd exchanging borrowed selves and swap stories.
(Emissary) Draft a pact for portable identities recognized across hubs.
(Arbiter) Ensure each persona is archived with consent before release.
(Lumenar) Raise a lantern chorus to celebrate every change.

shed_market_charter_workshop.title: Charter Workshop
shed_market_charter_workshop.text: Tables overflow with petitions, testimony ribbons, and blank charters awaiting signatures for the Amnesty of Names.

choices.text: Compile testimonies from the bazaar disputes.
Infuse the charter with truthlight sigils.
Gather signatories from the rally of portable identities.
Proclaim the Amnesty of Names across the market.
Step back to the bazaar.

ending_market_steward.title: Market Steward Rotation
ending_market_steward.text:
You file the steward rota you drafted and stay to pilot the first market shift.
Petitioners cycle through benches you rebalanced, clerks rotating before tempers fray.
By evening the Root Assembly posts your schedule as standard practice.

ending_shed_market_retirement.title: Shed Market Rotation Keeper
ending_shed_market_retirement.text:
You hang your final borrowed mask above the bazaar and settle into the rotation desk.
Molting patrons check in for husks and histories, trading favors you reconcile without fuss.
By closing bell the Quiet Ledger stamps you as permanent steward of the shed stalls.

shed_market_exit_plaza.title: Market District Exit Plaza
shed_market_exit_plaza.text:
At the edge of the Shed Skins district, a transit plaza provides connections to the broader archipelago. Identity verification stations ensure travelers can carry their chosen personas beyond the market boundaries.

Transport options connect to major hubs throughout the islands.

choices.text: Board transport to the Startways Nexus.
Take the route toward the Root Assembly territories.
Return to the market district.

starts.title: Market of Shed Skins Stall
starts.blurb: Run a stall within the Market of Shed Skins. Masks and bargains pivot identities mid-stride.
